meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to nuclear weapons or energy.
meanings.sent1: The country signed a nonnuclear treaty to prevent the use of atomic weapons.
meanings.sent2: The nonnuclear power plant relied on renewable energy sources.
meanings.sent3: The nonnuclear family picnic was a peaceful gathering without any atomic discussions.
meanings.sent4: Her nonnuclear approach to problem-solving focused on diplomacy rather than military threats.
meanings.sent5: The nonnuclear policy aimed to promote peace and disarmament worldwide.

meanings.definition: Not of or relating to the nucleus of an atom.
meanings.sent1: The nonnuclear particles were found outside the atom's core.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nonnuclear components of the atom.
meanings.sent3: The nonnuclear electrons decided to take a break from orbiting the nucleus.
meanings.sent4: Her nonnuclear theory proposed that atoms could exist without a nucleus.
meanings.sent5: The nonnuclear structure of the atom puzzled researchers for years.
